Halloween is barely a month away and the Maw hoots and hiccoughs, demanding that I fill it up with original low-budget horror games, but I have no time for such things, because my thoughts are full of bread. Bread! There is nothing so horrible, and nothing so seductive. I'd like to cut back on the stuff to minimise middle-aged corpulence, but there's a place down the road that sells this amazing, tearable sourdough, and I can't get enough of it. Fortunately/unfortunately, there don't seem to be any bread-themed PC games out this week. Here's our round-up.
 Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Hello reader who is also a reader, and welcome back to Booked For The Week - our regular Sunday chat with a selection of cool industry folks about books! I’m currently reading Brendan Keogh’s The Videogame Industry Does Not Exist. It’s interesting enough that I’m only mildly pissed off about the added academic book tax. Paying the academic price is funny if you say it like paying the iron price. Although, again, not quite funny enough to soothe my awful uni flashbacks of books that cost a week’s worth of groceries each. This week, it’s writer on Tomb Raider, Mirror's Edge, BioShock Infinite plus loads more, and host of BBC Radio’s Mythical Creatures - Rhianna Pratchett! Cheers Rhianna! Mind if we have a nose at your bookshelf?
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Tomb Raider, Mirror's Edge, and BioShock Infinite writer Rhianna Pratchett

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sundays are for squishing nids. I...was at least 35% wrong about Space Marine II. The new patch and a trick I learned to deal with Zoanthropes means I can play on Veteran now, and a lot of the issues I had with feeling overpowered have been sorted. I still think the guard are more interesting, but it's a very fun bit of smashy. Before I continue to never be wrong about a videogame ever again, let’s read some writing that I personally found interesting about games (and game related things!)
 Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Rogue Flight is an arcade space combat game with some StarFox somewhere in its DNA, "inspired by the landmark style of '80s and '90s prestige anime", also known as "the only good anime." It's due for release later this year and there's an announcement trailer below. 

 
Read more
articles.title: This arcade space combat game is inspired by the golden age of "prestige anime"

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Mojang want to release smaller updates more frequently for Minecraft, instead of one major update each summer. This evening's Minecraft Live stream detailed the Bravery And Bundles update, coming next, but also another update to follow in the next few months. A creepy update.

It doesn't have a name yet, but it'll add The Pale Garden, a new biome of eerie, grey trees and hanging moss that's quiet during the day, but which at night is inhabited by a new mob, the Creaking.

 
Read more
articles.title: Minecraft is getting a new biome and The Creaking, a creepy mob that only moves when you look away

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Minecraft's yearly showcase stream took place this evening. As part of the show, Mojang showed off some of the future updates coming to the game. First up: the Bundles Of Bravery update, which will add a proper hardcore mode to Bedrock Edition, as well as bundles, which will allow you to carry more items in your inventory when out adventuring.

 
Read more
articles.title: Minecraft's Bundles Of Bravery update will add hardcore mode and carrier bags

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
The weekend has arrived, right on schedule. And I refuse to go outside, because as my Glaswegian partner would say, it's fookin BALTIC out there. Now is the winter of our discount tents, and all that. Here's what we'll all be clicking on this weekend!
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I must confess, it was not till this very hour that I envisaged the possibility of an RPG party consisting exclusively of clowns. There's a fine tradition of clown characters in RPGs - Sylvando from Dragon Quest XI, Harle from Chrono Cross, the Jester in Darkest Dungeon - but a whole party's worth? The full big top? The maximum cabaret? Madness! Delightful madness! Here's the trailer for Clowned King, the next game from Moonana, developer of the colourful and melodious Keylocker. I like it better than a custard pie full of razorblades. I like most things better than a custard pie full of razorblades, but this comes reasonably high up that list.
 Read more
articles.title: Clowned King is a Fire Emblem-inspired RPG in which you lead a whole party of clowns

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The beauty of cards is that they can be anything. You can slap together a working game with them in a couple of minutes. Take 12 blanks, doodle some faces and landscapes, and lo, you have a procedural narrative generator. Make some duplicates, invent a few rules and lo, you have systems. 


Conversely, the great drawback of cards - especially in those roguelite deckbuilders people have been churning out since Slay The Spire - is that everything can be reduced to them. For example: last night, I played a round of Fungi with my partner, Fungi being a charming tabletop foraging sim in which you gather scrumptious chantarelles and boletus from the forest floor. This morning I resumed playing Breachway, out now in early access, in which you guide a starship through a series of wartorn solar systems, with battles unfolding as a turn-based exchange of cards corresponding to ship components. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Breachway early access review: a graceful reinvention of starship combat as a question of taut deckbuilding

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
We’ve known for years that consoles have simply become preboxed PCs, and now look: we’re getting into their controllers as well. The Razer Wolverine V3 Pro (and its wired cousin, the Wolverine V3 Tournament Edition) has looked to desktop peripherals in search of superior button-bashing, cannibalising the rather good Razer Viper gaming mouse series for its switches. The result is a high-performing, satisfyingly clicky pad that, yes, works wonderfully on PC – albeit one that rinses you for four times(!) as much as a standard Xbox controller.
Read more
articles.title: Razer’s Wolverine V3 Pro wants to make gamepads more mouse-like

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
As befits the “very normal gardening game” that puzzly mystery box Grunn winkingly bills itself as, the first tool I obtained was a pair of shears. The second tool I obtained was a trumpet. It doesn’t really work like a trumpet, and it does things no regular trumpet could or should do. I got a trowel next. Here’s the thing about the trowel: it’s a pretty good trowel. Nothing fancy. But recently, I keep digging up… objects. Objects most peculiar. I’ve got the weekend to sort this garden, and a cosy little shed to sleep in, so I really should just get on with it. Again, though, I must reiterate: I keep digging up… objects.
I go to clean some rubbish from the bathroom. I interact with the mirror and the game says: “You do not see anything in the mirror”. I take a note that says: I do not see anything in the mirror. I check the game again and no, I still do not see anything in the mirror. Sure it’s fine. Just a shit mirror, probably. They should get it replaced. What good is a mirror you can’t see anything in?
 
Read more
articles.title: Grunn review: I was lied to, this very good gardening game is not normal at all

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Two monitor-themed Should You Bother Withs in a row? Normally my desire for editorial heterogeneity wouldn’t allow it, but while ultrawide screens have been around for donkeys' years, 2024 seems to be welcoming a genuinely new take on gaming displays: the dual-mode monitor.
Read more
articles.title: Should you bother with... dual-mode monitors?

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Alice Bee (RPS in peace) wrote about platformer System Purge a while back, saying it starred a witch with a nice hop. So I tried out the demo for its sequel, System Purge: Hollow Point, and can confirm that the witch still has a nice hop. I'm thankful for this, because if the witch did not have a nice hop, the game would be maddening in a bad way. Don't get me wrong, it's still maddening. Just in a good way. The hop is good.
Read more
articles.title: System Purge: Hollowpoint is a maddening platformer, but the good kind of maddening

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
In the grim darkness of the far future you will no longer get quite so violently annoyed with your Spiced Margerine battle-bros Chairon and Gadriel, because they will actually finish off flickering, near-dead Tyranids rather than waiting for you to clean up. Sometimes when I'm playing Space Marine 2's campaign, I feel like I'm trying to direct untrained child actors from the orchestra pit. No, don't look at me, Gadriel - look at the Tyranid. He can only act concussed for so long. Hit him with your chainsword now, there's a dear.
 
Read more
articles.title: Beefy Space Marine 2 update reworks the AI, spawning and overall difficulty and adds a friendly sparring arena

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Valve instituted a fairytale punishment for cheaters in its unreleased laney shooter Deadlock yesterday. Cheaters will now be turned into frogs, provided the other players in the match vote for it. A Counter-Strike 2 modder proved the effect in a post on Xitter after the change was mentioned in some out-of-the-way patch notes by a Valve developer. 
Read more
articles.title: Deadlock cheaters are being turned into frogs as players get chance to vote on their fate

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
A new shooter set in the StarCraft universe is in the works at Blizzard, according to Bloomberg reporter Jason Schreier's book Play Nice, via Eurogamer. The project is headed up by Dan Hay, who worked various leading roles on Ubisoft’s Far Cry series, and also a 1999 CGI film starring Jim Belushi named “The Nuttiest Nutcracker”. The real-time strategy spinoff was also mentioned during an IGN podcast that aired yesterday.
Read more
articles.title: The ghost of StarCraft: Ghost endures as a new shooter set in the RTS universe is in the works at Blizzard

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
What exact percentage of unacknowledged irony is it when a digital game wants to sing the praises of paper-based art in the context of a story about fighting off a "blight" of digital creatures? If you were serious about that moral, Hirogami, you'd actually be printed on hammered-down treemulch. I decry thee, pretender! You're one of the very electronic critters you want me to battle. On the other hand, you do let me transform into an origami armadillo which can roll around like a pinball. Here's the announcement trailer.
 
Read more
articles.title: Print isn't dead, insists origami platformer Hirogami, in which you fight a digital Blight

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I don't know why we haven't written about Mechabellum before now, but we haven't. Let's correct that. It's an autobattler in which you plonk down squads of stompy robots then watch them win or lose against your opponent's army based on the formations and upgrades you've chosen. After more than a year in Early Access, it's just released version 1.0.

 
Read more
articles.title: Strategy autobattler Mechabellum has hit 1.0 after over a year in Early Access

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Do I like citybuilders such as Cities: Skylines and SimCity 4, or do I simply like roadbuilders? I spend most of my time in both those games tweaking the network of roads and junctions that form the veins of my cities, after all, and attempting to solve traffic jams via public transport and simulation-expanding mods.

Enter Junxions, a traffic engineering game which focuses entirely on the simulation and construction of roads, railways, and pedestrian walkways, right down to the coding of the traffic lights. It's aiming for a 2025 release and you'll find its trailer below.

 
Read more
articles.title: Junxions is a traffic engineering sim where you can finally fix that junction near your house

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Indie publisher Hooded Horse have been on a roll of late, publishing wonderful strategy games like Manor Lords, Against The Storm and Cataclismo. Good news, then, that they're currently running a publisher sale over on Steam where those games and many others in their library are discounted.

 
Read more
articles.title: Hooded Horse is having a Steam publisher sale, with discounts on Manor Lords, Against The Storm and many more

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
During his tenure as the foremost newsperson of the 1980s, Atari's Paperboy faced many grievous challenges - squabbling drunks, swarms of bees, the actual Grim Reaper - and yet, day after day he answered the noble call of journalism, lashing his basket to his doughty BMX and daring the treacherously oblique suburbs of Reaganite America. 


Speaking as both a news editor and a former paperboy, who broke his mind and body hauling obese Sunday editions to the millionaire houses at the top of the valley, Paperboy is my role model. Or he would be if my role model weren't actually Steven Spielberg's Freakazoid. Paperboy's heyday has long since passed into history, however, and the business of journalism has changed beyond recognition. People don't read newspapers anymore, they just eat pizza. This, at least, is the condensed analysis offered by Food Boy, which launched this week on Steam.
 
Read more
articles.title: Food Boy wishes only to deliver pizza, but the twerkers won't let him

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Martin Koníček)
articles.description: V článcích na internetu často narazíte jen na krátkodobé zkušenosti. Proto jsem se rozhodl podělit o svou tříletou zkušenost s Kubernetes řešením MicroK8s od Canonicalu, abyste věděli, co očekávat a na co si dát pozor.
articles.title: MicroK8s: tři roky zkušeností s Kubernetes v Ubuntu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si vypočítáme index tělesné hmotnosti (BMI), pohrajeme si s MIDI klávesami, všechno si ručně spočítáme a spojíme si PDF dokumenty.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (9. 10. 2024): spočítejte si BMI a nastavte MIDI klávesy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Matt Mullenweg už před mnoha lety předal kontrolu nad projektem WordPress nadaci. Jejím úkolem by mělo být nezávisle pracovat pro komunitu. Ukazuje se ale, že otec zakladatel stále drží moc a používá ji.
articles.title: Matt Mullenweg ovládá WordPress Foundation a tlačí na konkurenci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Zaměříme se na čip OPL2 (Yamaha YM3812), který umožňoval tvorbu hudby s využitím syntézy založené na frekvenční (správně spíše fázové) modulaci. Na PC se jednalo o přelomový koncept a OPL2 byl použit v mnoha hrách i demech.
articles.title: Zvuky a hudba na platformě IBM PC: čip OPL2 aneb Yamaha YM3812

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů se společně podíváme na pokutu udělenou společnosti Meta v souvislosti s ukládáním hesel v čitelné podobě, útočnou kampaň instalující skimmery na e-shopy nebo největší DDoS útok v historii.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: dvoumiliardová pokuta za nedostatečnou ochranu hesel

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Nadace FreeBSD Foundation spolupracuje se společností Quantum Leap ve snaze rozšířit možnosti FreeBSD na laptopech. Projekt HardenedBSD bude spolupracovat se společností Protectli na vývoji sítě odolné proti cenzuře a sledování.
articles.title: FreeBSD se zaměří na notebooky, HardenedBSD spolupracuje s Protectli

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Blender 4.3 beta přináší experimentální rendering UI přes API Vulkan, Wine 9.19 s podporou Unicode 16.0.0, Ardour 8.8 jako neplánovaná rychlá oprava za zpackané vydání verze 8.7.
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.2 doslova na spadnutí, Zrythm přechází z GTK na Qt6

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Utne se i mistr tesař, jak víme. Tentokrát to nezvládla Mozilla, která se z pozice síly pustila do křížku s vývojářem oblíbeného doplňku uBlock Origin v odlehčené verzi Lite / Manifest v3.
articles.title: Mozilla šla po krku rozšíření uBlock Origin Lite a přestřelila

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Nástup webových písem znamenal pro design stránek zásadní změnu. Do té doby byli jejich autoři odkázáni na písma instalovaná v uživatelských systémech, kterých je málo a mezi jednotlivými platformami jsou zcela nekonzistentní.
articles.title: Písma na webu: webové písmo a typografické speciality

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Budeme se opět zabývat neuronovými sítěmi. Ukážeme si změnu topologie neuronové sítě provádějící regresi, ale například i použití takzvané matice záměn (confusion matrix). Nakonec neuronovou síť naučíme malou násobilku.
articles.title: Neuronové sítě v knihovně scikit-learn (2.část)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Framework Qt má na světě novou verzi s dlouhodobou podporou. Opravuje více než 500 chyb a přináší další zlepšení výkonu aplikací i oproti verzi Qt 6.7 – stejný kód poběží rychleji. Pro macOS je ze nově podpora Qt Quick aplikací integrovaných do nativních menu systému, pro Windows 11 zase nový vzhled Fluent ladící s tímto OS. Podporován je i běh aplikací na Windows on ARM, podpora ARMu platí i pro Linux a tudíž z hlediska Qt je nyní hotova pro všechny majoritní platformy.
articles.title: Qt 6.8 LTS je rychlejší, s podporou Androidu 14 a iOS 18 a opravou více než 500 chyb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Je-li souborový systém na persistentním úložišti Tailsu poškozen, je od nové verze 6.8 uživateli nabídnuta jeho oprava při odemykání z uvítací obrazovky. Avšak ne všechny typy poškození úložiště jde opravit touto rychlou cestou, takže tvůrci navíc připravili detailní dokumentaci, která obnovu dat persistentního úložiště popisuje.
articles.title: Tails 6.8 s opravou souborového systému trvalého úložiště

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Kubernetes je dnes nejrozšířenější platformou na hostovaní Docker kontejnerů a je podporován velkými hráči na trhu (Google, Amazon, Microsoft) skrz Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Kuberneres pro provoz používají všechny velikosti firem, od startupu po korporace. Pojďme se naučit jej používat na dvoudenním kurzu Úvod do Kubernetes, který proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti ve dnech 14. a 15. října. Školení proběhne pouze online.
articles.title: Naučte se Kubernetes na našem dvoudenním školení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jozef Mlich)
articles.description: Společnost Sipeed přestavila NanoKVM, které je založené na architektuře RISC-V. Jedná se o zařízení typu IP-KVM, které umožňuje vzdálené ovládání počítače nebo serveru prostřednictvím připojení HDMI a USB. NanoKVM dokáže simulovat klávesnici, myš a další HID zařízení, nabízí možnost přístupu k BIOSu a ovládání napájení. Obraz je komprimován a přenášen k uživateli prostřednictvím Ethernetu, přičemž využívá různé obaly a kompresní metody.
articles.title: NanoKVM: vzdálený přístup pomocí malého počítače s RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jozef Mlich)
articles.description: Po 11 měsících nočních aktualizací je nyní k dispozici stabilní verze Mastodon 4.3 s vylepšenými upozorněními, lepším filtrováním nechtěné pozornosti a přehlednějším designem.
articles.title: Mastodon 4.3 vylepšuje upozornění, filtry a design

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Zúčastněte se webináře, který se zaměří na pokročilý monitoring Windows serverů pomocí Zabbixu. Na programu bude monitorování služeb, jako jsou Active Directory, DHCP, DNS, MSSQL, Exchange, registry, WMI, performance countery a využití externích PowerShell skriptů.
articles.title: Webinář: Pokročilý monitoring Windows serveru Zabbixem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Letošní Nobelovu cenu za fyziku si odnášejí John J. Hopfield z Princeton University a Geoffrey E. Hinton z University of Toronto za základní objevy a vynálezy umožňující strojové učení s umělými neuronovými sítěmi. Tedy za výzkum v oblasti AI pokládající základní kameny tohoto v současné době „velmi trendy oboru“.
articles.title: Nobelova cena za fyziku 2024 za výzkum AI a strojového učení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Očekávaná nová verze 6.2 desktopového prostředí KDE Plasma je na světě. Vyřešení posledních drobností tedy netrvalo víc než pár dnů. Tvůrci mezi novinkami vyzdvihují optimalizace pro grafické tablety včetně kalibrace a testovacího módu přímo v Plasmě bez nutnosti ovladačů/softwaru od výrobce tabletu.
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.2 je venku, vylepšuje HDR, podporu tabletů či správu napájení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Dávno slibované vydání přelomového GIMPu 3.0 se nadále odsouvá, po nedávné konferenci Libre Graphics Meeting ochořeli někteří klíčoví vývojáři a jeden správce a tak stále zbývá opravit 11 věcí, z nichž 3 jsou označeny jako blokující vydání (finalizace API, Space Invasion, plus problém se stylusy na Waylandu).
articles.title: GIMP 3.0 RC1 stále nevyšel, zbývá opravit 11 chyb, finalizovat API

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři podle očekávání vydali OpenBSD 7.6. Přináší opravy nejnovějšího útoku typu Spectre, podporu pro Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite, možnost využití hlubších spánkových režimů PSCI pro šetření energií, implementaci AVX-512 a vylepšení implementace AMD Secure Encrypted Virtualization (SEV).
articles.title: OpenBSD 7.6 přináší podporu AVX-512 a opravuje Spectre-V4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Dnes vychádza nová verzia jazyka Python 3.13. Medzi novinkami je aj vylepšený jazykový shell. Výzvy sú po novom farebne rozlíšené. Boli pridané príkazy exit, help, a quit. Teda pre návrat do terminálu už nebudeme musieť písať exit() alebo quit(). Rovnako pomenované funkcie zostávajú zachované.
articles.title: Python 3.13 vylepšuje zabudovaný REPL

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: V stredu 9. 10. 2024 o 10:00h bude spustený ďalší jesenný webinár zdarma. Tento webinár bude zameraný na bežné resp. chyby, s ktorými sa uživatelia stretávajú pri práci so Zabbixom a ukážeme si spôsoby, ako sa im vyhnúť. Prejdeme si praktické tipy na zlepšenie vášho zabbixového prostredia a jeho budúcej správy.
articles.title: Webinár zdarma: odporúčané postupy konfigurácie Zabbixu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V pátek vyšel oblíbený souborový systém OpenZFS ve verzi 2.3-rc1. Mezi dlouho očekávané novinky patří Direct I/O například pro databáze a Fast Dedup, který na rozdíl od online deduplikace ZFS není náročný na RAM.
articles.title: OpenZFS 2.3-rc1má Direct I/O a Fast Dedup

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři oznámili novou verzi Mitmproxy s pořadovým číslem 11, která přináší plnou podporu protokolu HTTP/3 v transparentním i reverzním proxy režimu. Kromě toho také nabízí podporu dalších typů DNS záznamů, podporu DNS-over-TCP a zahazování klíčů pro Encrypted Client Hello (ECH) z DNS záznamů typu HTTPS.
articles.title: Mitmproxy 11 nabízí podporu protokolu HTTP/3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bcachefs bylo zařazeno do jádra 6.7 na začátku roku a hned se u něj projevil problém. Linus Torvalds měl také výhrady ke kódu v 6.9. Nyní vývojář Bcachefs Kent Overstreet poslal do 6.12 nové opravy a zdá se, že Linusovi došla trpělivost.
articles.title: Linus Torvalds dává Bcachefs ultimátum

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Flipper Zero založený na STM32 před nedávnem oznámil firmware 1.0. V něm sice není podpora pro MicroPython, ale některé uživatelské firmware jej mají. Pokud byste chtěli MicroPhyton na Flipper Zero používat, není třeba měnit firmware. Stačí aplikaci stáhnout z oficiálního obchodu.
articles.title: Flipper Zero má podporu MicroPython

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jozef Mlich)
articles.description: V létě uvedla firma SoulsCircuit modulární počítač Pilet 7, který kombinuje Raspbery Pi 5 a sedmipalcovou dotykovou obrazovku. Nyní přestavili menší Pilet 5 s pětipalcovou obrazovkou a klávesnicí.
articles.title: Pilet 5: handheld s klávesnicí postavený na Raspberry Pi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Síťoví specialisté z celého světa se příští rok, již po dvanácté, sejdou na tradiční konferenci Peering Days. Organizátoři akce, jimiž jsou zástupci peeringových uzlů NIX.CZ (Česko), VIX.at (Rakousko) a BIX.hu (Maďarsko), zveřejnili na webových stránkách konference registraci.
articles.title: Konference Peering Days bude v březnu, registrace jsou otevřeny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Pražský Matfyz právě spustil další sérii svého Korespondenčího Semináře z Programování. Seminář je zcela zdarma přístupný a je určený hlavně středoškolským studentům, kteří se chtějí naučit něco nad rámec své každodenní školní výuky. Přes rok nabízí jak praktické tak teoretické úlohy.
articles.title: Matfyz zahajuje 37. ročník programovacího semináře

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Už příští víkend proběhne další ročník konference LinuxDays. Na programu pro letošní ročník najdete více než 70 přednášek a workshopů. Konference bude rozdělena do pěti sálů s různou kapacitou. Vstup na LinuxDays je jako obvykle zdarma, jen je potřeba včas vyplnit registrační formulář. Můžete si také koupit oběd, ale máte na to čas jen do pondělního poledne, protože platba na místě už pak nebude možná.
articles.title: Konference LinuxDays 2024 proběhne už příští víkend

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Místní bastlíři často hledají CO₂ senzory kvůli chytrým domům a například řízenému větrání. Stávající levné polovodičové CO₂ senzory trpí velkým driftem měřených hodnot, což se řeší periodickou autokalibrací. Ta však může být problematická, pokud nenastane při předpokládané koncentraci odpovídající venkovnímu vzduchu 400 ppm.
articles.title: Infineon PASCO2V15 CO₂ IR senzor s přesností ±50 ppm

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Prohlížeč Vivaldi 6.10.3483.4, který vyšel ve středu, má nové uživatelské rozhraní, ve kterém jsou záložky plovoucí a mohou být například kulaté. Nové jsou také ikonky a uživatel může nastavovat hustotu UI pomocí  Settings → Appearance → User Interface Density.
articles.title: Prohlížeč Vivaldi 6.10.3483.4 má nové rozhraní a startovací stránku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V dubnu jsme psali, jak na Raspberry Pi 5 zapnout podporu pro A2 SD karty, což zapne podporu pro Command Queueing. Karta je pak rychlejší. Nově není potřeba nic měnit a podpora sd_cqe je zapnuta pro všechny ve výchozím stavu. Pro zápis je pro jistotu vypnuta, objevovaly se totiž občas poškození souborového systému.
articles.title: Rychlejší A2 SD karty v Raspberry Pi 5 ve výchozím stavu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Zdenek Henek)
articles.description: O víkendu 5. a 6. října se koná ne-konference jOpenSpace. Pokud si chcete kouzlo živých přednášek vychutnat také, sledujte živé přenosy: sobota, neděle.
articles.title: Živé streamy z jOpenSpace 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Na nejmodernější ERP systém Helios Nephrite již přešla téměř tisícovka firem. Vločky jodidu nikelnatého díky magnetoelektrické vazbě slibují úžasné paměti. HP mění budoucnost práce. Tržby z bezpečnostního hardwaru příliš nerostly. Hybridní cloudové platformy novým paradigmatem plateb.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Tržby z bezpečnostního hardwaru příliš nerostly

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 40/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Kvantové provázání při dosud nejvyšší energii. Černé díry tvořené temnou hmotou by mohly ovlivňovat pohyb Marsu. Matematika a volby: Jak výsledky ovlivňuje velikost obvodu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Kolik je ve vesmíru světla?

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Když se podíváte na takové ceny, nemůže vám uniknout velký rozdíl mezi nimi a po přístupu na oficiální kanály. Například v případě Windows 11 Pro je srovnání cen mezi €20 a €259 naprosto senzační.
articles.title: Windows 10 jen za €14, Windows 11 za €20 v podzimním výprodeji na Goodoffer24

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Konica Minolta naučila kamery vidět dovnitř výrobků. Dokážou rozpoznat správné složení léků či potravin. Konsorcium LUMI-Q podepsalo smlouvu o zřízení kvantového počítače v ČR. Každý třetí útok ransomwaru na české firmy začíná zneužitím zranitelnosti. Přínosy AI v podnikových informačních systémech. Huawei Connect 2024: Chceme budovat infrastrukturu, která obstojí v budoucnosti. Laser změní izolant na polovodič.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Konsorcium LUMI-Q podepsalo smlouvu o zřízení kvantového počítače v ČR

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 39/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Golden: ve 2D se konečně podařilo připravit i zlato. Temná hmota mohla pomoci vytvořit supermasivní černé díry v raném vesmíru. Pozitronium ochladili téměř na absolutní nulu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Konsorcium LUMI-Q podepsalo smlouvu o zřízení kvantového počítače v ČR

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Salesforce představuje Agentforce – AI nástroj pro budoucnost zákaznických služeb. Novinky v MSP platformě Acronis: Copilot a automatizované postupy odezvy. Třetina firem v ČR má téměř nulovou míru digitalizace. Objevili nový materiál pro opticky řízenou magnetickou paměť.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Třetina firem v ČR má téměř nulovou míru digitalizace

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 38/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Supravodivost: Popsali bohatý svět hydridů yttria. Supravodič zesílený magnetismem. Pro supravodivost hydridů by mohl být klíčový také cer. Dnešní podobu Sluneční soustavy mohla zformovat další hvězda.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Podařilo se vytvořit otisk zrcadel do superfotonu

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Když vidíte podobné ceny, při srovnání nákupu softwaru na oficiálních kanálech s Goodoffer24 se při tak velkém rozdílu nemůžete splést. Například u Windows 11 Pro je srovnání naprosto úžasné, protože srovnáváte částku €20 s tradiční cenou €259.
articles.title: Oficiální cena Windows 11 Pro je €259 avšak Goodoffer24 účtuje jen €20

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Včera měl na Maxu premiéru film Money Electric: The Bitcoin Mystery (Tajemství Bitcoinu). Tvrdí, že Satoshi Nakamoto je  bitcoinový vývojář Peter Todd. Ten to odmítá.
articles.title: Tajemství Bitcoinu: Satoshi Nakamoto je Peter Todd

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Tým soulscircuit pracuje na open source přenosných počítačích pilet 5 console a pilet 7 tablet postavených na Raspberry Pi 5. V plánu mají kampaň na Kickstarteru.
articles.title: pilet 5 console a pilet 7 tablet

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Soud ve Spojených státech nařídil společnosti Google, aby otevřela svůj obchod s aplikacemi Google Play konkurenci. Uživatelé systému Android mají získat více možností stahovat aplikace a platit za transakce v nich uskutečněné. Rozsudek navazuje na loňský verdikt poroty týkající se tvůrce hry Fortnite, firmy Epic Games.
articles.title: Soud v USA nařídil Googlu, aby otevřel obchod s aplikacemi konkurenci

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Mastodon (Wikipedie), svobodná federalizovaná sociální síť, byl vydán ve verzi 4.3. Vylepšena byla správa notifikací i vlastní vzhled.
articles.title: Mastodon 4.3

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Organizace Free Software Foundation Europe u příležitosti včerejšího Dne Ady Lovelace vydala pod licencí CC BY-SA (Uveďte původ - Zachovejte licenci) půlhodinový animovaný film Ada & Zangemann - Příběh softwaru, skateboardů a malinové zmrzliny vycházející ze stejnojmenné knížky (online verze ve francouzštině).
articles.title: Ada & Zangemann - Příběh softwaru, skateboardů a malinové zmrzliny

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 1.11.0 dynamického programovacího jazyka Julia (Wikipedie) určeného zejména pro vědecké výpočty. Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu a v poznámkách k vydání. Aktualizována byla také dokumentace. S vydáním verze 1.11 se předchozí verze 1.10 stala novou LTS verzí nahrazující verzi 1.6.
articles.title: Julia 1.11.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 6.8 živé linuxové distribuce Tails (The Amnesic Incognito Live System), jež klade důraz na ochranu soukromí uživatelů a anonymitu. Přehled změn v příslušném seznamu. Tor Browser byl povýšen na verzi 13.5.6.
articles.title: Tails 6.8

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 6.8 (YouTube) multiplatformního frameworku a GUI toolkitu Qt. Podrobný přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání. Jedná se o LTS verzi. Pro komerční uživatele byla prodloužena podpora ze 3 na 5 let.
articles.title: Qt 6.8 LTS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Desktopové prostředí KDE Plasma bylo vydáno ve verzi 6.2 (Mastodon, 𝕏). Přehled novinek i s videi a se snímky obrazovky v oficiálním oznámení. Podrobný přehled v seznamu změn.
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.2

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Je druhé úterý v říjnu a tedy všem čtenářkám AbcLinuxu vše nejlepší k dnešnímu Dni Ady Lovelace (Ada Lovelace Day), tj. oslavy žen zabývajících se přírodními vědami, technologiemi, inženýrstvím a matematikou (STEM).
articles.title: Den Ady Lovelace

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The long-in-development GNOME triple buffering support that is patched into the Ubuntu and Debian builds and available for years in patch form might need to undergo a redesign. That's to better accommodate the NVIDIA Linux driver and likely help other non-Mesa graphics drivers too...
articles.title: GNOME Triple Buffering May Need To Be Re-Engineered - Helping NVIDIA Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Originally published last summer were patches from Intel for the Linux kernel to introduce a PCI Express bandwidth controller Linux driver to provide a PCIe cooling mechanism via bandwidth reduction to devices in order to prevent thermal issues. One year later this driver continues to be worked on and today brought the eighth iteration of these patches...
articles.title: Intel Revs Linux Driver Patches To Fend Off PCIe Thermal Issues Via Bandwidth Reduction

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The GCC 14 compiler marked Itanium IA-64 support as obsolete with plans to remove that Intel architecture in GCC 15. But for now at least the Itanium Linux compiler support has seen some reprieve with it being un-deprecated...
articles.title: GCC 15 Un-Deprecates Itanium IA-64 Linux Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While the Linux 6.12 merge window has been closed for more than one week, the modern NTFS "NTFS3" driver has seen some late feature enhancements as well as some fixes merged today for this new kernel version...
articles.title: NTFS Driver Lands Some Late Feature Enhancements For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For more than one year Arm engineers have been working on Guarded Control Stack "GCS" support for the Linux kernel as a means of protecting against return-oriented programming (ROP) sttacks with modern AArch64 processors. It looks like for Linux 6.13 this Arm GCS support will be ready for upstreaming...
articles.title: Arm's Guarded Control Stack "GCS" Support Looks Like It Will Be Ready For Linux 6.13

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With the Xeon 6980P Granite Rapids benchmarking at Phoronix the past few weeks it's been in a dual socket (2S / 2P) configuration. For those curious about the Intel Xeon 6980P 128-core server performance for a single socket (1S) configuration, here are those complementary results out today and for both DDR5-6400 and MRDIMM-8800 memory configurations. Thus a well-rounded look at the single Xeon 6980P performance compared to other single and dual socket Intel Xeon and AMD EPYC server processors.
articles.title: Intel Xeon 6980P 1S Performance With DDR5-6400/MRDIMM-8800

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Intel's oneAPI Rendering Toolkit with the likes of OSPRay, Embree, OpenVKL, Open Image Denoise, and others has been open-source for years. But it's not been exactly an open-source development model with making it easy for independent contributors to propose code changes. But Intel has now decided to make these projects more like traditional open-source projects and welcoming community contributions -- including from different hardware vendors...
articles.title: Intel's Rendering Toolkit Turns To More Open, Community-Welcoming Development Model

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: KDE Plasma 6.2 is now available as the latest refinement to the modern Plasma 6 desktop environment...
articles.title: KDE Plasma 6.2 Released With More Desktop Polishing

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Merged as part of last week's Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) graphics/display driver fixes for Linux 6.12-rc2 are a few performance tuning updates for Intel Xe2 graphics to benefit the recently released Core Ultra 200 Series "Lunar Lake" laptops...
articles.title: A Few Intel Xe2 Graphics Tuning Updates Found In Linux 6.12-rc2

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While there is the open-source MoltenVK project that implements the Vulkan API atop Apple's Metal graphics drivers on iOS/macOS, the 3D graphics consulting firm LunarG is exploring the possibility of implementing Vulkan to Metal translation using Mesa...
articles.title: LunarG Exploring Vulkan To Metal Translation With Mesa

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Today marks the release of Qt 6.8 as not only a new feature release but also the latest long-term support (LTS) release for this open-source, cross-platform toolkit...
articles.title: Qt 6.8 LTS Released With XR Module, Lower RAM Usage & Quicker Start Times

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While the recently-departed GNOME Foundation Executive Director in the summer statement was described as "drafting a bold five-year strategic plan for the Foundation, securing two important fiscal sponsorship agreements with GIMP and Black Python Devs, writing our first funding proposal that will now enable the Foundation to apply for more grants, vastly improving our financial operations, and implementing a break-even budget to preserve our financial reserves." It turns out that wasn't enough. The GNOME Foundation today announced some new cost-cutting measures for the project overseeing the open-source GNOME desktop...
articles.title: GNOME Foundation Announces Cost Cutting Measures Due To Budget Woes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: OpenBSD 7.6 is out this evening as another major step forward for this BSD operating system with enhanced hardware support, security improvements, updating various user-space software, and enabling other kernel enhancements...
articles.title: OpenBSD 7.6 Released With AVX-512, Initial Support For Snapdragon X Elite SoCs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: FEX 2410 is out as the newest monthly update to this open-source emulator that allows running Linux x86/x86_64 binaries on Linux AArch64 (ARM 64-bit) systems, including for games and software like Steam. With FEX 2410 there are yet more fixes as well as some new JIT optimizations...
articles.title: FEX 2410 Released With New JIT Optimizations

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following a last minute delay due to a performance regression, Python 3.13 stable is out today as the annual major feature release to this widely-used scripting language implementation...
articles.title: Python 3.13 Debuts With New Interactive Interpreter & Experimental JIT

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Git 2.47 is out today as the newest feature release to this immensely popular distributed revision control system...
articles.title: Git 2.47 Released With Improvements & Encouraging More Positive Code Reviews

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Gentoo Linux will be working on better support for ARM64/AArch64 and 32-bit ARM now that they have received an Ampere Altra Max server to help expedite their ARM build times for binary packages and installation stage builds...
articles.title: Gentoo Linux To See Improved ARM64 Support Thanks To An Ampere Altra Max Server

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While not expected to reach general availability (GA) state until October of 2025, available today in pre-alpha form is the openSUSE Leap 16.0 distribution...
articles.title: openSUSE Leap 16.0 Pre-Alpha Available, GA Next October

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: RPM 4.20 is out today as the newest feature release to this package manager system that's been in development the past year and featuring a variety of improvements for the likes of RHEL and Fedora based distributions...
articles.title: RPM 4.20 Released With Declarative Build System Support, Public Plugin API

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For those on Debian experimental or planning on upgrading to Ubuntu 24.10 that is releasing this week, the Ptyxis terminal emulator is now available in the package archive if wanting to try out this speedy terminal option...
articles.title: The Speedy Ptyxis Terminal Emulator Available On Ubuntu 24.10

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Yesterday when announcing the Linux 6.12-rc2 kernel, Linus Torvalds asked that the kernel maintainers do a better job moving forward with their commit messages...
articles.title: Linus Torvalds Asks Kernel Developers To Write Better Git Merge Commit Messages

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The NVGRACE-GPU VFIO driver was introduced for handling Virtual Function I/O support with the NVIDIA Grace Hopper Superchip so that the GPU device could be assigned to guests using KVM/QEMU and similar for virtualization. The NVGRACE-GPU driver is now being extended for supporting the forthcoming NVIDIA Grace Blackwell "GB" designs...
articles.title: NVGRACE-GPU VFIO Driver Preparing For NVIDIA Grace Blackwell

articles.author: Michael Larabel

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Earlier this week I delivered initial Intel Xe2 Lunar Lake graphics benchmarks on Linux while today the focus is on Lunar Lake's CPU performance. The Xe2 graphics performance under Linux was disappointingly slow with it performing even worse than Meteor Lake while RDNA3.5 graphics led. Intel has been investigating the Xe2 Linux graphics performance but I haven't heard any updates yet. Today the attention is on the Lunar Lake CPU side under Linux and it too isn't looking too good. The performance of this 8-core Core Ultra 7 256V SoC is poor in real-world multi-threaded scenarios and the performance-per-Watt is only compelling in a subset of workloads. The AMD Ryzen AI 9 365 and AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 Zen 5 SoCs tended to deliver the superior performance and power efficiency under Linux.
articles.title: AMD Ryzen AI 300 Series Dominates Intel Core Ultra 7 Lunar Lake Performance For Linux Developers & Creators

Tablets are one of those "one-does-all" pieces of technology that The Jetsons writers dreamt of in the 1960s. These screened squares have been around since the 1980s, but they've so advanced far past their ancient progenitor that it's hard to tell they're part of the same technological evolutionary family.


These days, finding something a tablet can't do is a genuine challenge. Many people I know look at tablets and see more accessible versions of their smartphones; they use them to place calls, send emails, and play their favorite mobile games. Some of my closest friends prefer to use them as digital artists' easels, and I've seen proof of how well their favorite tool works for them at local art shows. articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Getting and hiring Mercenaries is one of the many new core gameplay aspects that came with Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred. They’re NPCs who will fight alongside you, having their own leveling trees and abilities that can synergize with yours. 


If you want to get your own Mercenary, here’s what you must do.


How to unlock Mercenaries in Diablo 4


To unlock Mercenaries in Diablo 4, you will need to progress through the new Vessel of Hatred campaign. When you get far enough to the point where you unlock The Den, you can now get your first Merc. His name is Raheir.


There are three other Mercenaries you can unlock after unlocking Raheir. They are Subo, Aldkin, and Varyana. They will each have their own quests you need to complete. 


Upon completing a new Mercenary’s quest, you will then be able to recruit them back at The Den. You can swap between them at any time when you’re there.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You can technically have two Mercs: one is the main one with a full skill tree and the other is more of a quick backup. You’ll have to play around with them to make them more valuable as you progress from the early game to the end game. 


Lastly, you can level these Mercs up, giving them new skills and abilities. It’ll be up to you to decide which one best suits your character’s strengths and weaknesses.


Do you need Vessel of Hatred to use Mercenaries?


If you are looking to try out the new Mercenary system in Diablo 4, you will need to have the Vessel of Hatred expansion to be able to use it. This is mostly because you will unlock your first one in the new campaign, so it’s unobtainable without it.


Many players who bought the expansion may even miss this whole system entirely. It’s optional, but it does come with its benefits depending on your playstyle.

The post How to recruit Mercenaries in Diablo 4 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to recruit Mercenaries in Diablo 4

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
If you've been playing Destiny 2 for long enough, you'll know that not all armors are created equally. While all armor tends to have random rolls for its stat distribution, specific armors can have additional bonuses. 


For Episode: Revenant, a new set of armor is mentioned in the seasonal artifact but isn't properly explained. Here's what Shadestalker armor is in Destiny 2.


Where to get Shadestalker armor in Destiny 2


Image via Destructoid


Shadestalker armor is one of two sets of armor added with Episode: Revenant. This armor is acquired through completing Episode: Revenant activities, opening Revenant Engrams, and through later levels in the Season Pass (for those who purchase the Season Pass). While activities and the Season Pass rewards are straightforward, Revenant Engrams are earned through ranking up with the Apothecary Eido seasonal vendor and as a reward through Episode: Revenant activities.


Shadestalker Armor plays into two separate seasonal artifact mods, Fell the Revenant and Total Carnage. With Fell the Revenant, each piece of armor increases the amount of damage you'll do to Scorn enemies. Otherwise, Total Carnage grants damage resistance and health on finishers if you're wearing at least two pieces of Shadestalker armor. 


Is Shadestalker armor worth using?


Image via Destructoid


Shadestalker armor is well worth using this season. Beyond those two artifact mods mentioned above, this armor also sports the Eido's Apprentice armor perk. This grants one point of Apothecary Eido vendor reputation for each Reclaimed Vitality earned. For each piece of Shadestalker armor equipped, you get up to a maximum of four points per Reclaimed Vitality earned. This is a huge bonus for working toward completing the season, so slap this armor on when you get the chance.

The post What is Shadestalker armor in Destiny 2? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: What is Shadestalker armor in Destiny 2?

During the intro mission for Act I of Destiny 2 Episode: Revenant, Fikrul assaults and brings down the HELM. Thankfully, through the help of Failsafe, she's able to safely land the HELM within the Last City without causing serious damage.


While the HELM is out of orbit, however, it is still accessible through the new Last City...with a little work. Here's how to access the HELM in Destiny 2 Episode: Revenant.


How to get to the HELM in Destiny 2 Episode: Revenant


Image via Destructoid


If you're starting with Episode: Revenant and are in the Last City, you might've thought to open the map, and then click on the fast travel point for the HELM. However, this takes you right to the Last City fast travel point. This can be confusing, but you can thankfully still access the HELM without it. When loading into the Last City, turn immediately right and you'll see a large blue portal like the one pictured above. Head into it, and you'll be teleported to the lower stairs of the HELM.


Within the newly crashed HELM, you have access to all the kiosks you had before. You can still access the Vault, speak with the Postmaster, and talk to Failsafe through the central kiosk. You can even pet Captain Jacobson or the birds you collected, provided you did that content in the Episode: Echoes storyline. If you open the map, you can even access the Battlegrounds, Enigma Protocol, and Breach Executable from last season. The only thing you can't do is continue the Episode: Echoes storyline, as that disappeared with the launch of the newest Episode.

The post How to get to the HELM in Destiny 2 Episode: Revenant appeared first on Destructoid.

articles.description:
Chocolate Waffles in Disney Dreamlight Valley is a four-star dish that can be easy to make as long as you have access to the correct biomes for the ingredients. As it's a Disney game, it makes sense that it's in the shape of Mickey Mouse's head just like what the theme parks serve around the world.



Screenshot by Destructoid


Screenshot by Destructoid



Chocolate Waffles Disney Dreamlight Valley ingredients


To create Chocolate Waffles in Disney Dreamlight Valley, you'll need these ingredients:



Wheat


Eggs


Milk


Cocoa Bean



Most of these ingredients are easy to find. Eggs and Milk can be purchased from Chez Remy after completing the Ratatouille realm in the castle and getting Remy into your valley. They will cost you 450 Star Coins altogether. Wheat seeds can be bought from Goofy's Stall in the Peaceful Meadow for 1 Star Coin. You might as well buy the ingredient itself if it's available, however, as it's very slightly more expensive at 2 Star Coins. It will only take one minute to grow once planted and watered. 


Cocoa Beans are slightly trickier to find. They grow on trees within the Sunlit Plateau or the Glade of Trust every 30 minutes. You can also buy them from Goofy's Stall in the Sunlit Plateau for 75 Star Coins. 


Another dessert you can make


Have plenty of Cocoa Beans left? If that's the case, Hot Cocoa might be the way to go. You can form that with a Cocoa Bean, Milk, and Sugarcane. You can get Sugarcane (or its seeds) from Goofy's Stall in Dazzle Beach. Another dessert you can make without Cocoa Beans is Berry Salad. A Mint Sorbet is another way to go.

The post How to make Chocolate Waffles in Disney Dreamlight Valley appeared first on Destructoid.

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Sonic Sway move has been a part of many Dragon Ball iterations, whether from the anime or its video game collection. It's a powerful defensive tool that can be used to avoid rapid attacks, making it an essential skill for any fighter.


We'll show you how to perform the Sonic Sway in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero, furthering your defensive strategies.


How to consistently perform a Sonic Sway in Dragon Ball:  Sparking Zero


You can perform the Sonic Sway by holding your guard and pressing the Perception/Ki Blast button when an enemy attacks. Since there are two controller styles, the interaction for this will vary. To cover all the bases, here's how to perform Sonic Sway in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero's Classic and Standard controller styles.



Standard:

PlayStation: R1 (Guard) + Circle (Perception)


Xbox: RB (Guard) + B (Perception)




Classic:

PlayStation: Circle (Guard) + Triangle (Ki Blast/Rush Chain)


Xbox: B (Guard) + Y (Ki Blast/Rush Chain)





Before the enemy approaches, start holding the guard interaction. Then, once they start attacking, use Perception/Ki Blast. You'll need to time it right by hitting the second button before the opponent strikes. Or, you can make it a bit easier by holding your guard up and spamming Perception/Ki Blast. This tactic has helped me land Sonic Sways consistently without worrying about the timing.


Screenshot by Destructoid


When you've executed the Sonic Sway, a unique sound effect will confirm its success. Time will slow down, setting the stage for a sequence of multiple attacks. As your character gracefully dodges each one, you'll be treated to a thrilling experience reminiscent of the epic showdowns in the Dragon Ball series.


Take advantage of this dodging tactic in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero's World Tournament, Character Episodes, or online PvP. I suggest practicing it first in the training rounds to at least get the hang of it. 

The post How to Sonic Sway in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to Sonic Sway in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero

articles.description:
Haley Joel Osment has been voicing Sora since the release of Kingdom Hearts in 2002 and has reprised the role in every subsequent game in the series. However, this talented performer admitted that he was ready to say goodbye to his character.


Last month, series director Tetsuya Nomura said in an interview that he is already thinking about his eventual retirement and that he has begun the process of passing off the torch to new writers in the upcoming mobile game, Kingdom Hearts: Missing Link. In a recent episode of IGN Arcade, IGN asked Haley Joel Osment about the potential conclusion of the series after telling him about Nomura's statement.


For starters, Osment was not even aware of the fact that Kingdom Hearts 4 is currently in development until IGN told him personally. He explained …
articles.title: Classic Kingdom Hearts voice actor claims he’s ready to say goodbye to Sora

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Even though Throne and Liberty has a ton of content at launch, there is still more content to be unlocked until we reach the KR version of the MMORPG. The final content area in the current version is Saurodomo Island located in the southeast corner of the map. This is how you can access and how to unlock the Saurodoma Island waypoint in Throne and Liberty.





How to unlock the Saurodoma Island Waypoint


In order to even unlock access to the Saurodama Island Waypoint in Throne and Liberty, your server must have completed and unlocked the Ruler of Lycan Milestone from Chapter 4: Frenzy of Wraiths. Milestones unlock on timers starting when a server goes live, with the early Milestones unlocking every few hours and the later Milestones taking 12 hours for each one. That means that at the ti…
articles.title: Throne and Liberty: How to unlock the Saurodoma Island Waypoint

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Fun that doesn't break the bank


For some, the Nintendo Switch can be an expensive investment. Once you've purchased the console itself, there are additional Joy-Con controllers, the Nintendo Switch Online membership, and, of course, first-party titles like Super Mario Odyssey that almost never seem to go on sale, even years after their release.


Thankfully, there are some awesome games on this system that cost absolutely nothing to play and are most certainly worth your time and attention. Here are the 10 best free-to-play games on Nintendo Switch you can enjoy right now.


Asphalt Legends Unite


Image via Destructoid


Those missing the Burnout series may want to check out Asphalt Legends Unite by Gameloft. The intense speed, the outrageous tricks, and the decent graphics all go a lon…
articles.title: 20 best free games on Nintendo Switch right now

articles.author: Franklin Bellone Borges
articles.description:
Ever since his first appearance in Dragon Ball Super, Goku Black, and his Super Saiyan Rosé transformation rose to the spot as absolute fan favorites, a fact that helped the antagonist secure his spot within Dragon Ball Sparking Zero's massive starting roster. 


But in true Sparking (or Budokai Tenkaichi) fashion, Black won't be available from the get-go. For all looking to get him as soon as possible, here's how to unlock Goku Black in Dragon Ball Sparking Zero. 


How to Unlock Goku Black in Dragon Ball Sparking Zero


There are currently two ways to unlock Goku Black in Dragon Ball Sparking Zero, as you can both wish for him after calling Super Shenron and selecting ''I want more characters'' or purchase him from the game's shop for 75,000 Zenni. Be advised, however, that both Black —a…
articles.title: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero: How to unlock Goku Black

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Dragon Ball Sparkling! Zero is releasing on October 11, 2024, and people are excited to know more about the game. This game features a huge number of characters from different Dragon Ball series. 


Plus, Spike Chunsoft, the developer of the title, also selected some of the best voice actors in the industry. Here's the list of all voice actors in Dragon Ball Sparkling! Zero.


List of all English voice actors in Dragon Ball Sparkling! Zero


Image via Spike Chunsoft


Here's the list of all English voice actors that have a part in Dragon Ball Sparkling! Zero:


Actor
Role


Matthew Mercer
Hit


James Marsters
Zamasu, Fused Zamasu


Christopher Sabat
Vegeta, Great Ape Vegeta, Super Vegeta, Burter, Jeice, Recoome, Piccolo, Piccolo Fused With Kami, Yamcha, Vegito, Super Vegito, Gogeta, Zarbon…
articles.title: List of all voice actors in Dragon Ball Sparkling! Zero

articles.author: Matt Jackson
articles.description:
Image via Tetris Holding


US teen, Michael Artiaga, who streams online under the username “dogplayingtetris” has become the first known player to beat level 255 on Tetris to achieve a rebirth. The rebirth took Artiaga 82 minutes before he went on to amass 29.4 million points on the playthrough.


The whole thing was caught on stream and the streamer went on to say he would never play the game again. He was playing a patched version of the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) game, which prevents a known crash from occurring at level 155.


Tetris was launched in 1985 by Soviet software engineer Alexey Pajitnov. The title was first released on the Electronika 60 before making its way out of Soviet Russia and onto the IBM PC. Since then, it has been ported to some 65 platforms and set the wo…
articles.title: US teen becomes the first known player to complete Tetris

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Dazzling Dribbler Evolution is now live in EA FC 25, and you can upgrade one of your lower-rated players with stat boosts and new roles. 


The latest evolution isn't available for free, but it's one of the cheaper premium upgrades. All you have to spend it either 200 FC points or 10,000 coins. First, let's take a look at all the requirements of the new evolution which determines which cards can be used in the evolution. 


EA FC 25 Dazzling Dribbler Evolution requirements


Here are the requirements of the Dazzling Dribbler Evolution in EA FC 25.



Overall Max. 82


Position ST


Skill Moves Max. 3


Max PS 7


Pace Max. 85


Dribbling Max. 79



EA FC 25 Dazzling Dribbler Evolution upgrades


The Dazzling Dribbler Evolution has three levels of upgrades, and there are certain conditi…
articles.title: EA FC 25 Dazzling Dribbler Evolution guide: Best players to use

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
HiAnime.to has become a primary destination for many anime viewers. The site boosted its traffic to 300 million visits in September following the shutdown of a major competitor. This hasn't gone unnoticed by the MPA and ACE, which are now targeting the site and several dozen competitors in a new DMCA subpoena push. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Targets Piracy Giant HiAnime.to and Dozens of Other Streaming Sites

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Authorities in Italy say that a major IPTV piracy investigation has uncovered a "sophisticated fraud" involving channels and content owned by Sky, DAZN, Netflix and Mediaset. Coordinated by the public prosecutor in the southern city of Lecce, specialist financial and forensic officers were able to identify four people suspected of piracy and money laundering offenses. A court ordered the preventative seizure of five pieces of real estate and two vehicles.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Seizure of Real Estate & Vehicles in Pirate IPTV Investigation

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Deadpool & Wolverine' tops the chart, followed by 'Wolfs'. 'The Killer's Game' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 10/07/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After being removed from Apple's App Store, music streaming app Musi is fighting back with a lawsuit. Musi claims the app's removal, which was prompted by a YouTube complaint, was unjustified. The company sues Apple for breach of contract, seeking reinstatement and damages. The lawsuit raises questions about YouTube-related copyright claims, which have yet to be answered.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Musi’ Sues Apple Over App Store Removal Following YouTube Complaint

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In response to a call from the United States Trade Representative, the Premier League has submitted its report on the world's most notorious pirate IPTV-related platforms and services. Premier League matches are reportedly broadcast to almost 900 million households worldwide and by calling out those who broadcast illegally, the UK's top football league may even reach the magical one billion milestone.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Premier League’s Priority IPTV Piracy Threats Reported to U.S. Government

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The alleged operator of Modded Hardware has filed an answer to Nintendo's copyright complaint, denying any wrongdoing. The defendant, who represents himself in court, counters with a long list of affirmative defenses including fair use. The case will now move forward to the discovery process. Meanwhile, the Modded Hardware site has gone private.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Modded Hardware’ Defendant Denies Nintendo’s Copyright Claims in Court

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italian ISPs are required to work with AGCOM and rightsholders to ensure the Piracy Shield blocking system operates as intended. It's a burden that only benefits rightsholders, but the ISPs are expected to cover their own costs. That contribution was insulted this week by a legal amendment that threatens ISPs with prison for failing to report piracy to the authorities. Google describes it as a requirement to flood the judiciary to avoid prison.  ISPs speak of betrayal; it doesn't get any worse than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISPs ‘Betrayed’ Over Pirate Site-Blocking Threats, The Reckoning Will Be Invisible

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Motion Picture Association (MPA) has sent its latest overview of notorious piracy markets to the U.S. Government. The Hollywood group, which also represents Netflix and Amazon, lists a broad variety of online piracy threats. Aside from traditional pirate sites, it also includes domain registries and hosting providers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA Reports ‘Notorious’ Piracy Threats to U.S. Government

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In August, Telegram founder Pavel Durov was arrested in France and later charged with complicity in crimes allegedly carried out on Telegram. The platform's failure to cooperate with French authorities appears to have been a significant aggravating factor. The multi-billionaire was eventually released on bail, offering assurances that Telegram would change for the better. Interestingly, reports from France suggest that broadcasters of live sports are already seeing improvements on the piracy front.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Telegram’s Response to Piracy Has Improved Since CEO’s Arrest

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Audiovisual Anti-Piracy Alliance (AAPA) has released its 2025-2029 manifesto, requesting the EU to enable stronger anti-piracy protections. Most suggested improvements are targeted at combating live-streaming piracy. They include near instant takedowns as well as broader site blocking injunctions, which AAPA would like to expand to VPNs and web browsers.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: AAPA Seeks to Expand EU Pirate Site Blocking to Browsers and VPNs

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Open source Nintendo Switch emulator Ryujinx has thrown in the towel under pressure from Nintendo. Lead developer 'gdkchan' was reportedly contacted by the gaming giant on Monday. He was given the opportunity to stop working on the project and shut down everything under his control, presumably to avoid further action. The project's repo on GitHub has already been deleted.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Ryujinx Switch Emulator Project Shuts Down Under Nintendo Pressure

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The RIAA and MPA are concerned about a recent court ruling that could hinder their ability to combat online piracy using DMCA subpoenas. The court's decision suggests that IP addresses may not be considered "links", potentially limiting the scope of these subpoenas. This interpretation could impact the music and film industries' efforts to identify and take action against infringers and operators of piracy services.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: RIAA and MPA Urge Court Not to Disarm the DMCA Subpoena Anti-Piracy Tool

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Senate Budget and Finance Committees have approved amended legal proposals that require VPN and DNS services located anywhere, to block pirated content flagged by rightsholders. Other service providers, including ISPs, will face prison for failing to report "known" criminal conduct. A vote on the text is scheduled for today and the new legislation could be in place in less than a week.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Italy Approves Piracy Shield VPN/DNS Proposal, Risk of Prison For ISPs Intact [Updated]

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Google has obtained a default judgment against two men who abused its DMCA takedown system to falsely target 117,000 URLs of competitors' online stores. With none of the defendants showing up in court, a California federal court sided with the search engine. Through an injunction, the men are now prohibited from sending false takedown notices and creating new Google accounts.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Wins Lawsuit Against Scammers Who ‘Weaponized’ DMCA Takedowns

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A court in Greece has handed down one of the most punishing sentences on record to a man who resold pirate IPTV subscriptions. The Court of Thessaloniki heard that the local man sold subscriptions to thousands of customers, generating millions of euros. After the court sent him to prison for eight years, attention now turns to a seized customer database. The authorities are said to be preparing cases against customers, some of whom have already been arrested.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Reseller Who Made Millions of Euros Sent to Prison For Eight Years

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The head of telecoms regulator AGCOM confirmed this week that a memorandum of understanding between the Prosecutor's Office, Guardia di Finanza, and AGCOM, heralds a new stage in Italy's fight against IPTV piracy.  Massimiliano Capitanio said that automatic information exchange between the parties will enable subscribers of pirate IPTV services to be automatically fined. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Subscribers Warned They Face “Automated Fines”

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
As the wave of pirate site blocking spreads globally, some European countries show weakness in their execution. In Germany, for instance, the local blocklist included domains that no longer linked to pirated content, violating the blocking agreement. Tellingly, this only came to the forefront after a 17-year-old developer put together an unofficial transparency portal.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Homebrew Transparency Portal Reveals Needlessly Blocked ‘Pirate’ Sites

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Proponents of Italy's site blocking juggernaut to protect the country's top tier football league have shown their true colors. Proposed amendments to the 'Piracy Shield' law state that, if any network service provider even suspects criminal activity, they must immediately report to the authorities. This includes search engines, DNS and VPN providers, reverse proxy servers, internet security platforms.  Failure to report or even a delay in reporting would be punishable by up to a year in prison.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Will Piracy Kill Football in Italy? Not if Football Damages the Internet First

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Musi, a massively popular free music app with millions of users, has been removed from the App Store. Apple took action following extensive complaints from music industry groups, but whether these complaints directly triggered the app's removal is unclear. Information received by TorrentFreak further reveals that YouTube weighed in as well. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Apple Removes ‘Parasitic’ Streaming App ‘Musi’ Following Persistent Complaints

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (jibbodahibbo, Bosca)
articles.description:
Backyard Basketball, is finally ready to come off the bench for some sweet public testing! You can now play again on ScummVM this beloved Backyard Sports title (not to mention the last unsupported game on the SCUMM engine). Play with the Backyard Kids and even create five of your own! This game also features (now former) NBA and WNBA stars Kevin Garnett and Lisa Leslie!
Much like the other sports titles of this franchise, controls are point-and-click by default, with gamepad and keyboard options. Pick your favorite kids and play some 3 on 3 basketball. Don't forget your 110% Juice or Dunking Donut for a slamma jamma! Pass that ball in, listen to the live commentary from Sunny Day and Barry DeJay and shoot some jumpers on your way to a championship.
Are you ready to play? Dig up your good old CD and fire up the latest daily build!
>
articles.title: “What Time is it? GAME TIME HOO!”

articles.description:
Eight new cards have just been revealed from Supercharged Breaker, which releases in Japan on October 18th. We expect most of the cards from this set to become part of the international set Surging Sparks, which releases in November. Thanks goes to Toine L. for the translations!
Shellos – Water...

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Prvních 30 minut psychologická sci-fi, posledních 30 minut absurdní groteska. A z jednoho do druhého se to překlopí velmi nápaditě, promyšleně a zvolna. Představte si "Evil Dead 2" nebo "Braindead", ale pro současného diváka a s nějakou tou myšlenkou navíc. Všichni zúčastnění zaslouží pochvalu, protože  tento projekt velmi snadno mohl dopadnout hrozně. (Ilča 90 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Substance [The Substance] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dnes pokec (s Jakubem Červinkou) o epické videohře, kterou byste si neměli nechat ujít, a jejíž jediným problémem je, že má příliš pomalý rozjezd. Tento podcast je výjimečně k dispozici také na YouTube.
articles.title: Videohra: Warframe - 100 % (Host: Jakub Červinka)

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Hodně mi to připomnělo "On se bojí" nebo filmy Charlieho Kaufmana. "Jiný člověk" je ale "tlumenější" a první půlhodinu vypadá skoro jako normální film, který možná není úplně podařeně natočený. Teprve pak to začne být opravdu divné a vyjde najevo, že to od počátku všechno byl sofistikovaný plán filmařů a že tím asi chtěli něco říct. (Ilča 70 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Jiný člověk [A Different Man] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Výtvarně nádherné, ale jinak... Jako kdyby si v DreamWorks řekli "VALL-I, Železný obr a Laputa byly fajn, ale moc sofistikované. Pojďme natočit něco pro NORMÁLNÍ děti!" A to je škoda, protože tenhle film si klade potenciálně velmi zajímavé otázky, ale většinu z nich ignoruje na úkor roztomilých zvířátek a ujetého robota. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Rozzum v divočině [The Wild Robot] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film má docela originální námět, ze kterého by mohlo vzniknout něco opravdu unikátního, kdyby měl lepší scénář, lepšího režiséra a lepší herce. Takhle je to 10 zajímavých minut na začátku, pak hodina nudy a pak 30 minut WTF, ve kterých už není možné nijak soucítit s nikým na plátně a bylo mi srdečně jedno, co se vlastně "doopravdy" stalo. (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nikdy se nepouštěj! [Never Let Go] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: 110 minut docela kvalitního retra, které připomíná spíše "Po strništi bos" než cokoliv od Bohdana Slámy, a pak 20 minut něčeho zcela jiného, co je buď vrcholně originální nebo vrcholně nevydařené, ale v každém případě to pramálo navazuje na 110 předchozích minut. Znovu se ukazuje, že Sláma bravurně zvládá drobné situace, ale má problémy s dvouhodinovým, někam směřujícím dějem. Krobot je jako obvykle úžasný. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Konec světa - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Skoro dokonalý horor. Nepředvídatelný, ale přesto celkem logický děj. Hutná atmosféra, tvořená novými permutacemi starých klišé, bez nutnosti uchylovat se k lekačkám a stříkající krvi. Nepotřebuji to vidět znovu, ale dlouho jsem něco tak kvalitního neviděl a nevšiml jsem si mnoha věcí, které by se daly zlepšit. (Ilča 80 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Duše prokletých [Oddity] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Velmi příjemné překvapení. Dobře napsané i zahrané scény mezi lidmi, kterým poněkud nefunguje komunikace a navzájem si připadají "trochu divní". Fungovalo by to dobře jako normální (nehororové) současné drama. Ke konci se to trochu zvrhne do standardní vyvražďovačky, ale pořád výrazný nadprůměr s několika výbornými scenáristickými nápady. Neviděl jsem dánský originál. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nepřivolávej nic zlého [Speak no Evil] (2024) - 80 %
